        @RequestLimit
 @GetMapping
public ResponseBean<PageVo<java.util.List<ProjectRoughVo>>> getAllProjectPageable(@RequestParam(value="pageNum")
                                                                                                               int pageNum,
                                                                                                               @RequestParam(value="pageSize")
                                                                                                               int pageSize,
                                                                                                               @RequestParam(value="userId",required=false)
                                                                                                               java.lang.Integer userId,
                                                                                                               @RequestParam(value="compId",required=false)
                                                                                                               java.lang.Integer compId,
                                                                                                               @RequestParam(value="awardLevel",required=false)
                                                                                                               java.lang.Integer awardLevel,
                                                                                                               @RequestParam(value="sortBy",required=false)
                                                                                                               java.lang.String sortBy,
                                                                                                               @RequestParam(value="orderBy",required=false)
                                                                                                               java.lang.String orderBy)
                                                                                                        throws SelectException
        分页获取所有项目粗略信息
        参数:
        pageNum - 页码
        pageSize - 分页大小
        userId - 用户id
        compId - 竞赛id
        awardLevel - 获奖级别
        sortBy - 排序关键字
        orderBy - 排序方式
        抛出:
        SelectException

      • getAllResourceScoreById

        @GetMapping(value="/resource/score")
public ResponseBean<PageVo<java.util.List<ProjectResourceScoreVo>>> getAllResourceScoreById(@RequestParam(value="pageNum")
                                                                                                                                  int pageNum,
                                                                                                                                  @RequestParam(value="pageSize")
                                                                                                                                  int pageSize,
                                                                                                                                  @RequestParam(value="projectId",required=false)
                                                                                                                                  java.lang.Integer projectId,
                                                                                                                                  @RequestParam(value="resourceId",required=false)
                                                                                                                                  java.lang.Integer resourceId,
                                                                                                                                  @RequestParam(value="lowestScore",required=false,defaultValue="0.0")
                                                                                                                                  java.math.BigDecimal lowestScore,
                                                                                                                                  @RequestParam(value="highestScore",required=false,defaultValue="5.0")
                                                                                                                                  java.math.BigDecimal highestScore,
                                                                                                                                  @RequestParam(value="sortBy",required=false,defaultValue="time")
                                                                                                                                  java.lang.String sortBy,
                                                                                                                                  @RequestParam(value="orderBy",required=false,defaultValue="desc")
                                                                                                                                  java.lang.String orderBy)
                                                                                                                           throws SelectException
        分页查看资源评价信息
        参数:
        pageNum - 页码
        pageSize - 分页大小
        projectId - 项目id
        resourceId - 项目资源id
        lowestScore - 最低分
        highestScore - 最高分
        sortBy - 排序关键字,取值time、score
        orderBy - 排序方式
        抛出:
        SelectException

      • saveResourceScore

        @RequestLimit
 @PostMapping(value="/resource/score/{projectResourceId}")
public ResponseBean<java.lang.Object> saveResourceScore(@RequestBody @Validated
                                                                                                                                   ProjectResourceScoreDto projectResourceScoreDto,
                                                                                                                                   @PathVariable(value="projectResourceId")
                                                                                                                                   int projectResourceId)
                                                                                                                            throws InsertException,
                                                                                                                                   PermissionDeniedException
        评价项目资源
        参数:
        projectResourceScoreDto - 资源评分信息
        projectResourceId - 项目资源id
        抛出:
        InsertException
        PermissionDeniedException
